name: m3Hero
description:
I tried to make a game too big for this jam and I realize that I would not have the time to support it any more,

Even if I would like to go ahead and create a thorough history. The creation of game mechanics does not give me time to further develop the other facets of the game I give you despite everything that I created during the jam even if it seems to me little. good game, I'm waiting for your feedback. I would try to develop the continuation of the game in this direction
